actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of l949 to permit the distribution of certain surplus Federal property to certain organizations which provide for the education and recreation of young boys and girls.

summary.text: Permits the distribution of surplus Federal property under the Federal Property and Administrative Service Act to organizations which provide for the education and recreation of young boys and girls. (Amends 40 U.S.C. 484(j))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of l949 to permit the distribution of certain surplus Federal property to certain organizations which provide for the education and recreation of young boys and girls.
